attributes.action: Prevent the sale of LOL DOLLS In the UK, Due to their strong links to Pedophilia
attributes.additional_details: This is sickening for all parents! And we need to protect our children. I call upon our government to make change and a strong call to action! This has to be stopped!
attributes.background: Cancel and remove the sale of all LOL dolls. Putting LOL dolls in ice water reveals skimpy underwear and other hidden messaging tattoos and nipples. This need to stop immediately and protect our young and insistent children!!!!

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for banning specific products.  

You could start a petition calling for age restrictions on the purchase of toys, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
